Title: One Bus Away for Windows Phone
Description:
A Windows Phone 7 application written in Silverlight for the OneBusAway (www.onebusaway.org) website.

Allows mobile users to search for public transit stops and see real-time arrival data.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Windows Phone 7 application written in Silverlight for the OneBusAway (www.onebusaway.org) website.

Allows mobile users to search for public transit stops and see real-time arrival data.

This project is in the very early phases of prototyping. Feature suggestions or other feedback are welcome, please use the Issue Tracker.
